org.deidentifier.arx.framework.check
Class NodeChecker

java.lang.Object
  org.deidentifier.arx.framework.check.NodeChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
INodeChecker
public class NodeChecker
extends java.lang.Object
implements INodeChecker

This class orchestrates the process of checking a node for k-anonymity

check

public void check(Node node)
Description copied from interface: INodeChecker
Returns the information loss for the given state. Negative infinity means not k-anonymous.
